scripts.clean: del packages/**/lib && del packages/**/node_modules && del packages/**/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && lerna clean -y && lerna run clean && del ./node_modules
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.publish-manifests: ls -d $PWD/packages/* | xargs -I fld czctl app publish fld --account codezero -f
